meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to episodes.
meanings.sent1: The TV show had an episodical format, with each episode telling a different story.
meanings.sent2: Her episodical storytelling style kept the audience engaged throughout the performance.
meanings.sent3: The episodical nature of the book made it feel like a collection of short stories.
meanings.sent4: His life felt like an episodical series of adventures, each one more exciting than the last.
meanings.sent5: The episodical structure of the novel made it easy to read a little at a time.

meanings.sent1: The patient's symptoms were episodical, coming and going unpredictably.
meanings.sent2: The episodical rain showers made planning outdoor activities challenging.
meanings.sent3: Her episodical laughter during the movie kept surprising everyone in the theater.
meanings.sent4: The episodical bursts of creativity led to moments of great inspiration for the artist.
meanings.sent5: The episodical appearances of the mysterious character added suspense to the story.
